utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you guys, what are you doing tomorrow night?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, let me see... I-I believe I'm... yes, falling asleep in front of the TV.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, my agent hooked me up with six tickets to a great play.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I could fall asleep at a play.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What is it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's a one-woman play called "Why don't you like me: a bitter woman's journey through life".

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It sounds interesting!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, it does sound interesting, I mean, to listen to a woman complain for two hours, I don't think it gets bett...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know, I know, we can drive, we can vote, we can work, what more do these broads want?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You guys are gonna have a great time, I promise!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? How come that you don't have to go!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I wish I could but I just found out that I have to be at work really early the next day, so I can't go, but, you know, take the extra ticket and invite whoever you want.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, let's see, who do I hate?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, sorry... Oops, sorry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, here you go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh... oooh... oh, ah... Can I ask you a question?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you think it's possible for two friends to fool around and... and not have it be a big deal?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, I don't think it ever works. Why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No reason.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, no, Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who do you wanna fool around with?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nobody, forget it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Maybe.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You can't!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why? Seriously I did not understand a word that you said.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: In the hall.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You wanna fool around with Joey?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! You know, ever since I had that dream about him, and can't get it out of my head! And what's the big deal, people do it all the time!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who? Who do you know that are friends that just fool around?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, off the top of my head... Don and Janet.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who, who are they?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know them from work.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Both of them?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, one of them...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Which one?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know, what were the names I just said?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel, things can get incredibly complicated.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, all right, you're right, I won't do anything with Joey, I just thought that we Ok so that would be two cups of tarragon, one pound of baking soda and one red onion?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What the hell are you cooking!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, you guys won't believe what I have to do for work today.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, but, Ross you chose a career of talking about dinosaurs.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There're these two professors who are joining my department and I have to meet them here and show them around campus.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's so bad about that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's I just know they're gonna be a couple of windbags wearing tweed jackets with suede elbow patches.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: : Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: These aren't suede.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Excuse me, I'm looking for someone. You don't, by any chance, know a Ross Geller?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi, hi, I'm Ross Geller.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh, hi. I'm professor Wealer.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, oh, that's, that's, that's nice.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: It's a... It's good to meet you! Thank you so much for taking the time out to show me around.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, no, it's no big deal, I mean, if I weren't doing this I'd just, you know, be at the gym working out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is he gonna introduce us?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I think we're just blurry shapes to him now.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: And, by the way, I really enjoyed your paper on the connection between geographic isolation and rapid mutagenesis.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, ha, I wrote that in one minute.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Twenty bucks says they're married within the month.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We should probably get going, you know, we got a lot of ground to cover.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh, ah, isn't there another professor that is supposed to come with us?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't think so.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: I'm pretty sure, professor Spafford from Cornell?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, well he's obviously late and the rule in my class is "if you can't come on time, then don't come at all". An option that many of my students use. Shall we?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: You don't think we should wait for him?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know what, he's a big boy, I'm sure he'll find us, ok?

utterance.speaker: Professor Spafford
utterance.content: Professor Geller?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, damn it!

utterance.speaker: Jane
utterance.content: Hi Joey it's Jane Rogers, can't wait for your party tonight. Listen, I forgot your address, can you give me a call? Thanks, bye.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's happenin'?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, it's a real shame you can't make it to that one-woman show tonight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I'd love to, but I gotta get up so early the next day and so, you know me, work comes first

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah...

utterance.speaker: Message
utterance.content: "Hi Joey, it's Jane Rogers can't wait for your party tonight"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Stupid Jane Rogers!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You are having a party tonight??

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Kinda have a... a thing for the Days Of Our Life's people.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And you weren't going to tell us? How did you think you were gonna get away with that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I do it every year.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You do that every year??

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I didn't have to tell you that!! I'm stupider than Jane Rogers!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, that's why you got these tickets to that play, to get rid of us??

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And last year is that why you sent us to that medieval times restaurant?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OH! And the year before that, when you set up that nighttime tour of that button factory?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can't believe you guys went for that one!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, why wouldn't you invite us to your parties?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're fine, ok? But everyone else acts like an idiot around famous people!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, then so you just invite me...!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Please, I was trying to be nice, you're the worst one!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Joey, come on! Please, please! Let me come, I will behave, I promise! I will behave! Please, please, please...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok, ok! Fine! You can come, but don't tell anybody else. It's up on the roof at 8.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OH, a soap opera roof party!! I'm going to a soap opera roof party!! Oh my God, oh my God!! And it's out of my system!

utterance.speaker: Professor Spafford
utterance.content: And then my wife and I went on a cruise to the Galapagos. There was a sea food buffet you wouldn't believe. There were clams, and mussels, and oysters, and cracked crab, and snow crab, and king crab. It's a pity I'm allergic to shellfish.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, where did you get your undergraduate degree?

utterance.speaker: Professor Spafford
utterance.content: And that's not all I'm allergic to.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, it's not over!

utterance.speaker: Professor Spafford
utterance.content: I'm also allergic to peanuts, and cashews, and almonds, and filberts...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So basically all nuts?

utterance.speaker: Professor Spafford
utterance.content: Interestingly... no.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Kinda playing fast and loose with the word "interesting".

utterance.speaker: Professor Spafford
utterance.content: If you'll excuse me I'm going to use the restroom.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh my God!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I've lost the will to live.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Let's ditch him!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Come on, he's still in the bathroom! I'm begging you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh... ok, fine. But... ehm... I just have one question for you, ehm... When we exit should we walk, or run, or prance, or stroll...

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Stop it, stop it! He talks slow but he might pee fast! Ok, let's go!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, hey you guys! This is Charlie! Charlie, this is Phoebe and my sister, Monica.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, Charlie is gonna be joining my department.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, you're a paleonthologist, too! Oh, ok, now, what do you think of Ranion's new theory of species' variegation in segmented arthopods?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Well, I think he's a little out there, but he does have some interesting ideas...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ah, ah.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry. I'll take this. Excuse me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ranion's theory of species variegation?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I saw the article on your coffee table and I memorized the title to freak you out!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, did you two have fun?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God, she's great! I mean, we-we have so much in common and she's just cool, and funny...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And I don't know if you've noticed but she's a HOTTY!! HI!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey... Hi you guys! Listen, you know what? I'm not feeling really well. I think I can't get out for the play.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? Wh-what's wrong?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know! I think it's kind of serious! Oh, you know... I was watching this thing on TV this morning about... Newcastle disease... and I think I might have it!!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh, Newcastle disease is a secretion borne virus that only affects chickens and... other poultry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ... Ok, who is this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm sorry, Rachel, this is Charlie Wealer, she's a collegue.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hi! I would check your hand but... I'm sure you don't want to get my chicken disease!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, Rachel, Can-can I see you for a sec?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure! Oh...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're not sick!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Yes, I am!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, then, why are you... all dressed up??

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: When you're sick, you do whatever you can to make yourself feel better!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You just wanna stay home so you can make a move on Joey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, no, no! I heard you before, that is so not what this is!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, what is this?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok! Joey is having a secret Days Of Our Lives party up on the roof and he sent you guys to the play to get rid of you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: WHAT?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wh-what's going on?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey is having a secret Days Of Our Lives party up on the roof!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And he didn't want you guys to know about it but I came over here to tell you!!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: I thought you came to say you were sick.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok professor or detective?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey's having a party and he wasn't gonna invite us?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, and he does it every year! That's why he's sending you to that play! That's why he sent us to that medieval restaurant and to that button factory!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And that horrible museum tour!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I arranged that...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey you guys, I'm turning in. Have fun.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We know about your party Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What party?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The game's over! Take off your robe!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok... I mean...

utterance.speaker: Everyone
utterance.content: No!! Cover it up!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nice to meet ya!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Hey alright! Hey, glad you could make it Thanks for coming.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Kyle Lowder!

utterance.speaker: Kyle Lowder
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I love you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, that's why I didn't invite you. you have to calm down, alright... go, go get yourself a drink or something...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh yeah that's what you want - my inhibitions lowered.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, can you believe we are surrounded by all this? I can barely control myself.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica, you might want to remember that you are married. Where is Chandler anyway?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Where the hell is everybody?

utterance.speaker: Bitter lady
utterance.content: Why don't you like me?! Chapter One: My first period.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Joey said no autographs! But if she's gettting one, then I want one too: To Monica. And none of this "best wishes" crap. I want "love".

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok actually Mon, Matthew was just giving me his phone number.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh man! If I had known I was coming to this party I never would have gotten married!

utterance.speaker: Matthew Ashford
utterance.content: It was nice to meet you Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nice to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Matthew Ashford
utterance.content: Call me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We will!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look at you with all the guys!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I guess you have forgotten all about Joey?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, well, I guess I have forgotten about Joey and clearly you've forgotten about Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please... Chandler is the love of my life... ... oooh leather pants! Have Mercy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, eh... it's probably gonna be hard for you to leave Boston, huh?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Actually, I'm kinda happy to be leaving... I just broke up with someeone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ooh... so sad... Still, it can't be easy for you to leave Harvard? Especially after working alongside a Nobel Prize winner like Albert Wintermeyer?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Actually, Alby is the guy I broke up with.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You... you dated Albert Wintermeyer?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ... And you called him Alby!? I mean that's like... like calling Albert Einstein... er... Alby...

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Yeah, well, he is a brilliant man.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Eh, you think? I mean, you went out with a guy who improved the accuracy of radiocarbon dating by a factor of 10!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Yes! And while that is everything one looks for in a boyfriend, he had a lot of issues...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! like what?! Oh I'm sorry, I don't mean to pry... it's just that this must be what regular people experience when they watch "Access Hollywood".

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Ok, you want the dirt? Alby was seriously insecure. I mean, he was really intimidated by the guy I dated before him.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who is intimidating to a guy who won the Nobel Prize?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: A guy who won two.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Two? Wha...? Don't tell me you dated Benjamin Hobart

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Yeah... for three years.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! Have you ever been in a relationship with someone who hasn't won the Nobel Prize?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: ... no... bu but there was my first boyfriend Billy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah? no, no Nobel Prizes for him?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: No, but he did just win the McArthur genius grant.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh... huh... what a loser! Some more wine?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey Ross!

utterance.speaker: Rache
utterance.content: How is it going with Charlie?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh Great! After I finish my wine I'm going to blow my... eh. average-sized brains out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, What's the matter?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She... she only dates geniuses and Nobel Prize winners. Oh my God, at the chinese restaurant earlier today, I put chopsticks in my mouth and pretented to be a woolly mammoth.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I always loved that!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Of course you would, your brains are smaller than mine!! Man, I can't compete with the guys she goes out with, they are so out of my league! oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Worse?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh much, much worse. I did my impression of Joan Rivers as one of the earliest amphibians... "Can we walk"? Oh, you... you like that?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on! I think this is funny!

utterance.speaker: Bitter lady
utterance.content: Well, I bet you are all thinkin' "Now would be a really great time for an intermission", huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: oh yes, God yes!!

utterance.speaker: Bitter lady
utterance.content: Well, you're not gonna get one! Because in life there are no intermissions, people. Chapter 7: Divorce is a 4 letter word. How could he leave me?!?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I... I don't know... you seem lovely.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Ross, this is one of my co-stars, Dirk. Dirk, this is my good friend Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nice to meet you.

utterance.speaker: Dirk
utterance.content: Hey! So what show are you on?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I'm no actor, I'm a professor of palaeontology.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's a science.

utterance.speaker: Dirk
utterance.content: Oh! Hey well listen, I play a scientist on "Days". And my character has just won the Nobel prize.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Ross, listen, Dirk was wondering about the woman that you brought and if you guys were together, or...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, well no, but I mean, she only goes out with really, really smart guys.

utterance.speaker: Dirk
utterance.content: Hey, I got a 690 on my SATs.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'd lead with that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's it, just sign right on the bra .

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Don't worry Joe, I won't come next year!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What have you got there?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Just some boys gave me their phone numbers.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, let me see! Damn, that's a lot of guys! Are you a little slutty?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I think I am.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Let me see if I approve any of these clowns. This guy wears a rug . This guy's Canadian . And this guy is in a cult, ok, and it costs you $5,000 to get to level three and I don't feel any different.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pass, pass, oh, pass, double-pass, pass...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why, why, what's wrong with these guys?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nothing major, it's just that, you know, they're not really good enough for you, and you deserve the best.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, you're so sweet.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's true. But you know what, it doesn't matter because I already know who you're gonna go home with tonight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who ?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes, 'cause we live together, that's a joke!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Screw it, I didn't get it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Gotcha.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Very funny... Joey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, how did you enjoy the play?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my god, honey, I'm so so so so so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well you should be. You missed the most powerful three hours in the history of the theater.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You really liked it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah! I mean at first I hated it, but why wouldn't I, because as a man I've been trained not to listen! But after chapter 16: "fat, single and ready to mingle", I was uplifted.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh really!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, I had no idea the amazing journey you go through as a woman! Tell me, tell me about your first period!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Did somebody sign your bra?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So I got it when I was 13...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey Ross! So listen, about you and the dinosaur girl, are you really just gonna let a couple of Nobel prizes scare you off? What is that, come on, a piece of paper?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's actually a $1,000,000 prize.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Go Charlie! But my point is, ok so she dated them but she also broke up with them. Maybe she's looking to, you know, slum it with some average Joe PhD.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, maybe. I do have my whole career in front of me. I mean, I can still win a Nobel prize. Although the last two papers I've written were widely discredited.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're so much more than just brains! You're sweet, and kind, and funny...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And sexy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok well give her a chance to see all of that!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, you're right, thanks Pheebs, I'm gonna go find her.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good for you! And hey, I thought your paper on punctuated equilibrium in the Devonian era was top notch!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Stop going through my stuff !

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just wanted to let you know I've changed my mind: I'm gonna do it, I'm gonna kiss Joey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, you can't! Friends hooking up is a bad idea.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Please, what about you and Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's different! I was drunk and stupid!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well hello !

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What about all the guys that you've got the phone numbers from? Why don't you just kiss one of them?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I could, I could but I don't want to! I want to kiss Joey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright . I think it's a big mistake but it's your decision.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm gonna do it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And I can't stop you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Rach, have you seen Charlie anywhere?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm smarter than him!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, thank you so much for these tickets, Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh well, this was a really important experience for me, and I wanted to share it with you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, you're so wonderful.

utterance.speaker: Bitter woman
utterance.content: Why don't you like me! Chapter one: my first period.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can't believe you guys bought that, enjoy your slow death .
